name: Forbidden Fruit
description:
The most profound impact on humanity has been Eve's story. Eve was exiled from the Garden of Eden after eating the forbidden fruit — Eve, the Mother of Humanity, is blamed for mankind's demise.

Inspired by TANTAN's exceptional figurative style, which is a masterful combination of neo-classical art and manga. Her work methodically inserts deliberate brush strokes in her composition with brilliant and rich colors as part of her own style. In addition to her excellent art skills, her exceptional expertise in slicing apples with such precision is something that no one else can match.

Created on January 23, 2022 (revised & completed on 12 February 2022)
